about.title: About me
description: I'm a full stack developer. Currently my favorite languages are Python using Django Framework for creating API's and React with TypeScript for web development.

contact.title: Contact
description: Contact me for questions, suggestions, budget estimative or support.

service.title: Services
description: If you need someone to develop an app, personal or commercial website, even a simple landing page you are in the right place!
I deliver projects through Github in a private or public repository, in order to keep the code always versioned, facilitating the history control process.

services.name: Development
services.description: Development of end-to-end projects, creating API's in REST standard and creating dynamic or static websites.

services.name: Mobile-friendly
services.description: Responsive design making your website accessible regardless of device. Creating screens from the Mobile First concept.

services.name: Analytics
services.description: Gain insight into who's browsing your site so you can make smarter business decisions.

services.name: Clean code
services.description: Development following the main design patterns, aiming to make the code more intuitive, elegant and easy to maintain.

skill.title: Skills
description: Welcome to the skill session. If you want to know a little more about a skill, just click on the desired one!

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Python is an interpreted, object-oriented, high-level programming language with dynamic semantics. Being used for server side web development, software development and system scripts.

skills.name: Django
skills.description: Django is a web framework for Python that encourages fast development and clean, pragmatic design. It's responsible  for much of the web development work.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: JavaScript is a lightweight and commonly used language on web pages, whose implementations allow client-side script to interact with the user and create dynamic pages. It is an interpreted programming language with object-oriented features.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft. Introducing additional features such as binding strict types to JavaScript. TypeScript overcomes one of the biggest flaws of JavaScript, which is finding bugs in the code during the development phase, checking for any problems at compile time, preventing the delivery of the defective product to the end customer.

skills.name: React
skills.description: React is an open source JavaScript library focused on creating user interfaces on web pages. This framework also allows the creation of reusable components for our application and the composition of elements that can be changed, without the need to reload the page.

skills.name: Styled Components
skills.description: Styled Components is a CSS-in-JS library, created to be a successor to the CSS Modules, being a way of writing CSS scoped to a single component and not leaking to any other element on the page.

skills.name: Github
skills.description: GitHub is a version-controlled source code and file hosting platform using Git, allowing programmers or any user of the platform to contribute to private and/or Open Source projects anywhere in the world.

skills.name: Docker
skills.description: Docker consists of an Open Source platform, whose objective is to manage applications in containers as if they were VM's. Containers are isolated from each other and group their own software, libraries and configuration files.

seo.title: Matheus Galhani | Portfolio | Full Stack Developer
